data.title: Vite App
data.meta_description: Eric Thomas (90) TE - 2010 (Junior): Played in 11 games, primarily on special teams ... moved from defensive end to tight end during spring practice ... saw ...
data.text:
2010 (Junior): Played in 11 games, primarily on special teams ... moved from defensive end to tight end during spring practice ... saw time at both positions in a reserve role during the season.

2009 (Sophomore): Appeared in six games and made three tackles as a reserve defensive lineman and on special teams.

2008 (Freshman): Played in 11 games as a reserve defensive lineman and on special teams ... made collegiate debut against Murray State ... Academic All-Big Ten selection.

2007: Redshirted the 2007 season ... named scout team player of the week following the Penn State game.
